body_html:
Yes the problem is gone now. I really just reinstalled everything dint try changing the LD_LIBRARY_PATH. I guess the cuda installer took care of it.

This is what I see now :

$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
:/usr/local/cuda/lib64

body:
Yes the problem is gone now. I really just reinstalled everything dint try changing the LD_LIBRARY_PATH. I guess the cuda installer took care of it.

This is what I see now :

    $ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
    :/usr/local/cuda/lib64
